snippet: Herman Wouk, author of 1950s blockbusters like “The Caine Mutiny” and “Marjorie Morningstar,” returns with a novel made of text messages, e-mails and Skype transcripts.
abstract: Herman Wouk, 97-year-old author of 1950s blockbusters like The Caine Mutiny, returns with novel The Lawgiver, which uses text messages, e-mails and Skype transcripts to further the story.
lead_paragraph: Herman Wouk, author of 1950s blockbusters like “The Caine Mutiny” and “Marjorie Morningstar,” returns with a novel made of text messages, e-mails and Skype transcripts.

headline.seo: Herman Wouk on his New Book, ‘The Lawgiver’
headline.main: At 97, He Has a Book (or 2) Left
headline.print_headline: At 97, He Has a Book (or 2) Left
